name: Icebreaker!: Friend or Froze?
description:
When Romie immigrates from the Philippines, he's not entirely thrilled with all the snow.  So  naturally, he makes up an evil monster story to stop his siblings from annoying him  to go outside. What he doesn't expect is this so called monster is real, and adorable.  Romance ensues? Features
  • 2.5k Words!
  • Cursing!
  • 30 minutes of content!
  • A glass closet!
Team! Directors: BooBoo, LN not I.N Character Design: Miku Sprite Artist: Ace (color), Miku (lineart) Background Artist: Goggles, Wigggle Logo Artist: Wigggle Programmer: IntStories
